epfl.sweng.tools

Class JSONParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.sweng.tools.JSONParser

  • public class JSONParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    LorenzoLeon This class is used to parse JSON Objects to QuizQuestion and vice versa.
